<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Disorienting Opening](/Feats.aspx?ID=1727) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 126 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Attack of Opportunity](/Feats.aspx?ID=145)

</column>

---

You use your foes' openings to expose even greater weaknesses. When you hit a creature as part of an Attack of Opportunity, that creature becomes [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) until the start of your next turn.
name: Disorienting Opening
